name: Elon
description:
Elon is a Space Survival Craft game where you play as Elon, a normal maintenance person on a space station in the future.
After a mysterious accident you are left are stranded, floating through space on a piece of a the space station.  Mine asteroids for materials and build tools to help you craft supplies, stations, cosmetics, and additional Hubs to expand what is now your home.  
But be warned space is a dangerous and deadly place where one mistake can mean certain death.  
Can you defy the odds and survive stranded in space?

Explore unique and beautiful space-scapes. Mine and gather resources, craft and build customizations and upgrades, and travel through space to amazing destinations. From planets and nebulas to blackholes you never now what you might see. 

Elon is being developed by the indie studio MonoBehavior, a small but passionate company bringing a new take to survival craft. Join them as they take us all on an atmospheric and beautiful journey where we are reminded of the very simple fact: space is a dangerous place. 

KEY FEATURES

Unique and fun gameplay  — Survival in space is hard. You need food, water, and oxygen just for starters. Luckily the universe has everything you need, with the help of a bit of technology. Can you build a home and survive in a place where one mistake can mean a certain and slow death. Did you go to far from the station? Did you ignore the warnings? Now you don't have enough compressed gas to get back?  That's life, or rather, death in space. 

A Universe of possibilities — The Universe is huge and full of resources. With nothing but the but home out of your reach your free to build and explore.  From small hubs to giant planet sized stations the universe is yours to fill. 

Co-op Coming Soon — Space can be lonely soon you can invite a friend to join you.
